title: Covid-19: PM and chancellor to self-isolate in U-turn
content:
1. Covid-19: PM and chancellor to self-isolate in U-turn  BBC News
  2. Boris Johnson will isolate after public backlash following announcement that he will dodge quarantine rules  Yahoo! Voices
  3. BREAKING: Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak will self-isolate as normal  Sky News
  4. Big build-up, drum roll, then the speech. Is that all there is to Boris Johnson’s levelling up?  The Guardian
  5. UK PM Johnson exposed to COVID but dodges full quarantine  Reuters Australia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
